actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to provide Federal insured financing on resale of cooperative dwellings.

summary.text: Provides federally insured financing for mortgages involving a dwelling unit in a cooperative housing project which is covered by a blanket mortgage under the National Housing Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to provide Federal insured financing on resale of cooperative dwellings.
